title: Bulletin of the School of Oriental Studies, London Institution
aka: Bulletin of the School of Oriental Studies (University of London)

contents.note: JSTOR (full text also available for subscription or payment)

succeeded-by.note: Bulletin of the School of Oriental and African Studies, University of London

additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
'London Institution' was changed to 'University of London' in the title for volume 8 (1935) and later.
